headline: Ulta reexamines in-store basics after losing beauty market share
summary: The company is revamping its leadership and investing in store and digital CX strategies to help it keep up with an evolving beauty landscape.

headline: Should you buy Ulta stock given Amazon threat? This Wall Street analyst answers
summary: Investing.com -- Loop Capital reiterated its Buy rating on Ulta Beauty (NASDAQ:ULTA) shares, arguing that the “Amazon threat” surrounding the stock appears to have been “overblown.”

headline: Ulta Beauty focuses on share buy-backs
summary: A model of good management, once a position in 's US portfolio, the US cosmetics chain has been treading water on the stockmarket since its growth plateaued.
